artist: Suzuki Harunobu; Author: Komatsuya Hyakki; Publisher: Nishimuraya Yohachi
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Elegant Erotic Mane'emon (Fūryū enshoku Mane'emon 風流艶色真似ゑもん)
text: A young couple are nearly discovered at night as they try to have their last encounter before committing double-suicide; Mane'emon contemplates how to prevent the tragedy and resolves to hide the short sword to prevent them from breaking the hearts of their parents.
title: The Place of the Heart, No. 11 from the book Elegant Erotic Mane'emon (Fūryū enshoku Mane'emon), vol. 1
